appDescription.message: Fill out any web form by using only your voice!

popup_allow_permission_btn_str.description: String on the button on popup page that allows user to navigate to permissions page

popup_allow_permission_btn_tooltip_str.message: click here to Allow Audio Permission

popup_help_desc_str.message: If you have experienced any issue, please report it

popup_default_language_label_str.description: label for default language on popup

popup_mic_btn_tooltip_str.message: Click here to turn On/Off Speech Recognition
popup_mic_btn_tooltip_str.description: mic button tooltip on popup page

option_permission_success_msg.message: Now you can close this tab and use this tool to type on any website with your voice!
option_permission_success_msg.description: success message when user accepts permission

option_permission_error_msg.message: Please Allow Permissions in order to use this tool!
option_permission_error_msg.description: error message when user rejects permission

emoji_not_found.description: message to when emoji is not found.

option_emoji_setting_str.description: emoji setting label on option page

popup_help_how_to_use_str.description: How to use this tool ? string

command_emoji_description.message: Say 'emoji emoji's name' to insert somewhat similar emoji from list of 1800 emojis. checkout full list of emojis in setting page

command_press_enter_description.message: Say press enter to Press 'Enter' key. Useful for submitting forms

command_newline_description_new.message: Say new line to get a new line.

command_mindfulness_description.message: Say 'mindfulness' to insert a random mindfulness thought in the text box

audio_permission_todo_label.message: Please Click on the button below to allow audio permissions in order to use this tool.

audio_permission_notice_info.message: Note: If you have accidentally disallowed permissions, then you can allow them from clicking top left corner of search bar of this tab

audio_permission_error_msg.message: Please Allow Permissions in order to use this tool!

audio_permission_success_msg.message: Now you can close this tab and use this tool to type on any website with your voice!

popup_mic_listening_note.message: * Now click on any input and speak
popup_mic_listening_note.description: note to user when mic starts listening

command_arrow_description.message: Say 'arrow left' to type left arrow key. possible commands: arrow left | right | top | down

command_search_description.message: Say search cat or google cat to search cat on google.com

command_bookmark_description.message: Say 'Bookmark this page' or 'remove bookmark' to add or remove bookmark

05B91A69_8814_3B81_1332_6F72A3862DE3.message: Say 'play song_name', it will play the song from youtube.
05B91A69_8814_3B81_1332_6F72A3862DE3.description: command Say 'play song_name', it will play the song from youtube. alias

166739BA_DD4A_0FAC_8635_877B90A755FC.message: Say 'highlight keyword' to highlight the keyword on current page and vice-versa
166739BA_DD4A_0FAC_8635_877B90A755FC.description: command Say 'highlight keyword' to highlight the keyword on current page and vice-verca alias

F16BC2BB_AD3E_749E_683B_560DF6F914E5.message: Say undo/redo/undo all to do undo/redo/undo all.
F16BC2BB_AD3E_749E_683B_560DF6F914E5.description: command Say undo/redo/undo all to do undo/redo/undo all. alias

837C899B_2695_0944_4AB9_3F18657DAF86.message: Navigate to input elements by saying next and previous
837C899B_2695_0944_4AB9_3F18657DAF86.description: command Navigate to input elements by saying next and previous alias

7025F41F_A247_2606_5EEF_EF009D666B11.message: Say scroll down/ scroll up to scroll the page.
7025F41F_A247_2606_5EEF_EF009D666B11.description: command Say scroll down/ scroll up to scroll the page. alias

271F0428_E067_4BEB_90D6_8117EF8E7E29.message: Say 'go to facebook.com' to open facebook.com in new tab. Say 'go to bookmark bookmark_name' to open bookmark url.
271F0428_E067_4BEB_90D6_8117EF8E7E29.description: command Say 'go to facebook.com' to open facebook.com in new tab. Say 'go to bookmark bookmark_name' to open bookmark url. alias

79A538B2_EC72_DB1F_02AC_5A35F75E550D.description: command Hide/Unhide the current page alias

239D85D7_8DB9_6DD6_2F9E_ED0E5D6511B9.message: control media (audio and video) on the page.
239D85D7_8DB9_6DD6_2F9E_ED0E5D6511B9.description: command control media (audio and video) on the page. alias

8DF1225E_6D10_2F85_2550_0CCACAC586BF.message: Say 'type your_text' to type your text.
8DF1225E_6D10_2F85_2550_0CCACAC586BF.description: command Say 'type your_text' to type your text. alias
